Typically will be Magica based armor.  This is the only type that offers two styles for the chest - a robe and shirt.
Typically will be Stamina based armor.
Typically will be Health based armor
Items that are only available within the various Arenas found throughout Tamriel.  Some of these items are only available by completing the arena on Veteran mode.
To craft these, you must visit the desired crafting station and have also researched the minimum required traits to succesfully create the item.
Items that can be obtained within the 4 Person dungeons on either Normal or Veteran.  This list does not include Monster Sets.
2 Item sets. Helms obtained by killing the dungeon boss on Veteran mode.  Shoulders from the 3 NPC Pledge givers. The Golden in Cyrodiil can sell both.
subText: Light, Medium, and Heavy armor types

desc: Chest, Head, Legs, or Weapons via World Bosses. Waist and Feet via Delve bosses. Shoulder, Hand, or Weapons from Public Dungeon bosses.  Ring and Necklace via Dark Anchor. Treasure Chests
Reward for the Worthy based on Battlegrounds and Cyrodiil content.  Some of these items may also be purchased from various vendors, see location for this information if available.
